item.title: CAR 2013 PhD scholarship information
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description:
CAR, the body who funds my postdoc, are advertising two full time PhD scholarships for students who are interested in researching air quality. There are CAR investigators who will serve as supervisors in Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Wollongong and Hobart. Further information can be found in the three documents below.

  • CAR 2013 Scholarships_Information
  • PhD Scholarships CAR 2013 Call for Applications
  • PhD application form CAR 2013.docx

item.title: Biopesticide research programs at QUT
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description:
The email below the cut details three PhD programs that are based on the level above me in the Biopesticides lab at QUT. All projects involve collaboration with researchers in the UK; the mathematics project involves collaborating with researchers at Oxford and the other two with researchers at CABI.

  • Chemistry - The interaction between insect cuticular chemistry and pathology and gene expression in Metarhizium anisopliae
  • Mathematics - Development of mathematical models of insect pathogen dynamics
  • Genetics - Colonisation of the rhizosphere by entomopathogenic fungi: gene expression, metabolite translocation and impacts on invertebrate pests

If you’re interested in these, contact Associate Professor Caroline Hauxwell.

Dear all I’m looking for applicants for 3 PhD students in the current round. Please would you pass this on to anyone you think might be interested? Applications to QUT’s research scholarships close Oct 12 2012. Interested applicants should first send a CV and expression of interest stating how your skills and experience will help you to address the research questions to A/Prof Hauxwell by 5th October at the latest. Details of QUT’s scholarships and full application requirements (due 12th October) can be found here:

  • http://www.qut.edu.au/research/scholarships-and-funding/research-scholarships

Outlines of the three projects can be found here:

  • https://fileshare.qut.edu.au/public/hauxwell/Higher_Degrees_Research_Projects_Proposal_Form___chemistry.pdf
  • https://fileshare.qut.edu.au/public/hauxwell/Higher_Degrees_Research_Projects_Proposal_Form___maths.pdf
  • https://fileshare.qut.edu.au/public/hauxwell/Higher_Degrees_Research_Projects_Proposal_Form___roots.pdf

Thanks carrie Dr Caroline Hauxwell Associate Professor Queensland University of Technology
